Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-1180 affecting package crash for versions less than 8.0.1-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-1180 affecting package crash for versions less than 8.0.1-5. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package crash is earlier than 8.0.1-5, affected by CVE-2025-1180
